title: ElectionRecord
description: All data from an ElectionGuard election.

base_hash.description: The base hash `Q` which is a SHA-256 hash of eleciton parameters including the prime modulus, generator, number of trustees, decryption threshold value, date, and jurisdictional information, as well as the contest configurations.

trustee_public_keys.description: The public keys/coefficient commitments for each trustee.

proof.description: A proof of posession of the private key.

cast_ballots.description: The encrypted ballots cast in the election.

spoiled_ballots.description: The decryptions of the ballots spoiled in the election, including their encrypted selections, their decrypted selections, the cleartext of each selection, and proofs of the correctness of the decryptions.

contest_tallies.description: The decryptions of the tallies of each option for each contests in the election.
